settings.title: What is Afterpay?
settings.text: Afterpay is a service that allows you to make purchases now and pay for them in four equal payments made every 2 weeks without any interest.

settings.title: How do I use Installments by Afterpay?
settings.text:
Simply shop online and add items to your shopping bag and checkout as normal. At checkout choose Installments by Afterpay as your payment method. First time customers will need to register with Afterpay and provide payment details as usual, returning customers simply log in to make their purchase. It’s that easy!
Please note that all items in your shopping bag must be eligible for Installments by Afterpay. A minimum purchase amount may apply and you must meet additional eligibility requirements to qualify.

settings.title: Can I use Installments by Afterpay if I’m an international customer?
settings.text: Installments by Afterpay is only available to customers with a US billing address within the US and a US mobile phone number. Customers with international billing addresses will not be able to set up an account with Afterpay.
